name: Romancing SaGa [SNES]
description:
Three evil deities...Saluin, Death, Sheraha.
Those who once challenged their fellow gods were defeated by the power of the gods in cooperation with mankind.
The last one remaining, Saluin, was contained by the "Destiny Stone".
However, after many years, the seal was about to be broken...

A new type of RPG with many unprecedented variations.
Players are free to choose the main character from a selection of eight individuals and embark on an adventure, but the purpose of their departure and the branching of events are completely different.
In addition, a "free scenario" system has been implemented in which different stories develop depending on how the same character progresses.
